Title: The Tongue of Ba-Shon
Description:
Thank you for coming, $p. I am sorry to have been so cryptic, but I could not risk alerting the mogu to my work here.

They are seeking something in the valley. Plundering the tombs of their old kings for relics of power.

I could not observe them long before having to flee, but I did manage to recover a relic of my own.

The Tongue of Ba-Shon will let us communicate securely over long distances, but only after I have bound it to myself.

I think I'm ready to begin, if you are.
ObjectivesText: Assist Lorekeeper Cho in performing the Binding of Ba-Shon.
CompletionText: I'll need to bind my essence to the Tongue, then you can use it to speak with me from anywhere.
RewardText:
This must be a very powerful relic for Zuan to want it back so badly.

It frightens me to think of what else they may find in the tombs...
